name: voter-guide-2018
description: Baltimore Sun Voter Guide for Election 2018
author: carljohnson@tronc.com

scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:results && yarn run make-content && yarn run css && yarn run hash-assets && yarn run hugo && yarn run minify && yarn run clean:data
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:data && yarn run clean:public && yarn run clean:dist
scripts.clean:content: find content -mindepth 1 -delete && git checkout -- content && yarn run make-content
scripts.css: postcss --parser postcss-scss --use postcss-node-sass --use autoprefixer --map -o dist/css/app.css static/scss/app.scss
scripts.css:watch: postcss --watch --parser postcss-scss --use postcss-node-sass --use autoprefixer --map -o dist/css/app.css static/scss/app.scss
scripts.hash-assets: scattered -srcbasepath dist -output data/assets.json '*.css' '*.jpeg' '*.jpg' '*.js' '*.png' '*.svg' && scattered -srcbasepath static -dstbasepath dist -merge-existing -output data/assets.json '*.css' '*.jpeg' '*.jpg' '*.js' '*.png' '*.svg'
scripts.test: yarn run test:eslint && yarn run test:prettier
